column1: Here's the percentage of "deaths" related to #coronavirus #COVID19 Thought it had a 1-3% death rate? https://news.yahoo.com/coronavirus?ref=mail-notify
This is beyond horrendous. So difficult to watch. Just when we thought coronavirus was the worst thing we would have to deal with.

So children can’t go back to school, men & women can’t go back to work , no sports or music events but we can riot in the millions & not catch/spread the Corona virus come on people take that fucking mask off unless you about to do some illegal shit in that case leave it on
